title: Miscellany
author: Moses ben Naḥman
description: Contents: Glossary to the Moreh Nevukhim by Samuel ben Judah Ibn Tibon (ff. 1-13r); Propositions and definitions from Euclid's Elements (ff. 13-14r); ʻArugat ha-Ḥokhmah u-Fardes ha-Mezimah by Abraham Ibn Ezra (ff. 14r-15r); Commentary on the Sefer ha-Yetsirah by Moses ben Naḥman (f. 15); Philosophical fragment Maʻamar ʻAyin ha-Raʻ (ff. 15v-16v); Recipes (f. 16v);  Index to Abraham Abulafia's Sitre Torah (f. 17r); Samuel ben Judah Ibn Tibon's Hebrew translation of Maimonides's Dalālat al-Ḥaʼirīn = Moreh Nevukhim (ff. 17v-119).
